item.description:
Winter Open House: Grand Opening of Winter Garden & Limonaia!

Gardening / Horticulture - Reception

Sunday, November 14, 2010
10:00 AM-5:00 PM

See the newest $8M expansion at Tower Hill: the GRAND OPENING of the magnificent Winter Garden, featuring hundreds of plants for winter interest and a whimsical turtle fountain, and the riveting Limonaia, or lemon house, displaying beautiful lemon and camellia trees. Discover all that Tower Hill Botanic Garden has to offer throughout the year. Enjoy food samplings, prize drawings, gift shop specials--including the latest holiday merchandise, and guided tours at 11am at 2pm. Learn about volunteer opportunities, private rentals, educational programs, special events, horticulture, and more. Twigs Caf√© serves lunch from 11am - 3pm. Members of the Bay State African Violet Society will be on hand for an African Violet re-potting clinic from 11am-3pm; bring your African Violets & they will be re-potted for only $1 per plant!

Cost: Free & Open to the Public
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a Meet up sign posted and will be around the front entrance at 12 noon but will leave my cell phone # to those who will attend
item.name: Grand Opening at Tower Hill (FREE : )
